name: Paul Sauer 2004
description: A classic since 1981. '04 has 70% Cabernet Sauvignon, with equal amounts Merlot and Cabernet Franc. Winning aromas cedar, spice, subtle berry, leading to oaky palate a touch lighter, less fruit-substantial than usual, but promising useful development. Vinified traditionally, like all these, in open fermenters. 2 years in French oak.' - Platter's SA Wine Guide 2008, 4.5*
